dct_title_s: Ḫarīṭa heyʼeti ṭarafından 1/25,000 muḳāyesede olaraḳ aḫz̲ ve tersīm ve bu defʻa 1/100,000 mik̮yāsına nażaren taṣgīr olunmuş İstanbūl ve civārı ḫarīṭaṣıdır
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours and spot heights.

Legend shows automobile traffic, open roads, ordinary roads, paved roads are railway-engine, (train) lines, telegraph lines, streams, buildings, bridges, waterways, marshes, sand dunes, cliffs, harbors, lighthouses, windmills, water mills, triangulation points (reference points), fountains, doors, mines, forests, thickets, meadows, vegetable gardens, orchards and Muslim-Christian-Jewish cemetery.
